item.title: Mindful people's preferences on autonomous vehicles
item.description: Most important concepts of the research projects: Mindfulness People absorb information more or less mindfully, much the same way as they act with differing degrees of self-reflection. Too often, individuals seize on standard classifications, use routine rules and procedures, and then proceed to become seduced by habits (Wayne et al., 2006). Autonomomous vehicles In recent years, many manufacturers and software companies announced that autonomous vehicles will be in the market shortly (Menno et al.
